Title: Mother Daughter Laser Razor
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Nora Smith, Jim Dauterive (creator), Lizzie Molyneux (story editor), Kelvin Yu (story editor), Scott Jacobson (executive story editor), Holly Schlesinger (executive story editor), Wendy Molyneux (story editor), Nora Smith (story editor), Steven Davis (story editor)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, John Roberts
Plot: Linda struggles to connect with Louise when they attend a mother-daughter seminar, while Bob takes Tina to get her legs waxed.
